title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 106.4 - Registration amendments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 106.4 - Registration amendments

State Regulations

If a registered vehicle does not conform with the category
appropriate to the registration plates displayed on the vehicle, an application
must be filed with the Department to amend the registration and replace the
registration plates with ones appropriate to the actual configuration of the
vehicle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
106.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
